definition: a danger concealed within sth/hidden damage/misfortune not visible from the surface

sentences.english: These problems, if unsettled, will become lasting threats to security.

sentences.english: Any safety deficiencies or violations must be corrected immediately before proceeding with operations.

然而有几个隐患困扰着中国。

sentences.english: Icy roads are a hidden danger to motorists.

sentences.english: Beware of using clip-on lamps as these can be dislodged, causing a fire hazard.

sentences.english: A danger foreseen is half avoided.
sentences.chinese: 预见隐患犹如防患一半。
